title: Chess & Life
headline: FIDE, USCF Chess Player
searchDescription: Growing up, I realized a chess game is just like a long journey of life.

title: Brave
headline: Life Far From My Homeland
searchDescription: There is always a second place that feels like home, I gotta adapt to a complete new world, outside of the bubble I was comforted inside.
longDescription:
Above is the picture of me and my hero.

A glance of mischief, tongue astray,
A heart of steel, come what may.
In winter's chill, a light she brings,
My hero, on whispered wings.

My hero, she really is.  This picture, with Christmas lights blurred behind, isn't just a snapshot – it's a moment from a symphony of love, with her as the soaring melody.

Think of the playful opening, like her mischievous eyes and tongue - that’s the lively first movement. But listen deeper, and you hear the strength, her resilience - the steady bass line grounding me, the cello's warmth in hard times.

That freezing night, bundled in our winter gear, felt like a winter wind section. Yet, between us, there was warmth, a rich adagio of quiet understanding.

The blurred golden lights? Violins, shimmering, echoing how she lights my life - not suddenly, but with a constant glow. She's the harmony enriching everything, the rhythm moving me forward.  More than just my girlfriend, she conducts my symphony of love.  And in this picture, we're in perfect concert, for a moment caught in time.

title: Growth
headline: Gap Year Before Entering College
searchDescription: I explored myself in various versions. I become more freedom. I found peace in music. I found my soul in storytelling.

title: Confidence
headline: TEDx Speech: A Wary but Positive Look at AI
searchDescription: From a sitting duck to a motivational speaker, I aim to ignite hearts and minds, encouraging everyone to pursue their happinesses in life.
